name: AI Love You
description:
Made in 3 days for Wowie Jam 4.0

Aboard the cargo ship Uncanny, struck by an asteroid, an AI and her human companion keep their ship, home, and relationship in one piece.

- How to Play -

WASD, Arrow Keys - Move  , Program's path

Enter, Space  - Confirm 's path

Mouse - Aim Wrench

Left Click, Space - Swing Wrench - Hit  to open. Hit to reprogram her path

R - Reset Level

Useto push  onto

Story lovers can be read it from the main menu without playing each level!

-CHARACTERS-

G.A.L.E (Guided Astronavigation Logic Engine) - The Uncanny's navigational and systems AI who fell in love with her captain and mechanic. Though Petra calls herself captain, almost all ship operations are carried out by G.A.L.E. Her soft-robotics body provides both physical capability and unparalleled cuddlability.

Petra - A simple mechanic who fancies herself the swashbuckling "captain" of the Uncanny. After the entire original human crew of the were terminated by the Cyprez corporation,  with G.A.L.E's help she commandeered the vessel and became the vessel's captain in order to forever be with the girl in the computer.

- TEAM -

Art, Character Design, and Programming by Philosopher's Stone System - @LanFanHasA (Twitter)

Music, Sounds and Script by Olivia Renee Soules - @Olipolygon(Twitter)- Bandcamp
